format: A data frame with 53940 rows and 10 variables:
title: Prices of over 50,000 round cut diamonds
description:
Description
A dataset containing the prices and other attributes of almost 54,000
diamonds. The variables are as follows:

parameters.depth: total depth percentage = z / mean(x, y) = 2 * z / (x + y) (43–79)
parameters.clarity:
a measurement of how clear the diamond is (I1 (worst), SI2,
SI1, VS2, VS1, VVS2, VVS1, IF (best))
parameters.color: diamond colour, from D (best) to J (worst)
parameters.cut: quality of the cut (Fair, Good, Very Good, Premium, Ideal)
parameters.table: width of top of diamond relative to widest point (43–95)
